Title: Strategies for mitigating nitrous oxide production and decreasing the carbon footprint of a full-scale combined nitrogen and phosphorus removal activated sludge system
Authors: Ewa Zaborowska, Xi Lu, Jacek Makinia
Abstract:
Highlights:
- An ASM2d-N2O model predicts liquid and gaseous N2O in the full-scale bioreactors
- Heterotrophic denitrification as predominant N2O production pathway
- N2O production mitigation via adjusting oxygen concentration and recirculation rate
- Potential 10% reduction in the total carbon footprint after optimization
GEMINI_What_problem_does_this_paper_atte: - The paper attempts to model and mitigate nitrous oxide ($N_2O$) production in a full-scale combined nitrogen and phosphorus removal activated sludge system.\n- It aims to decrease the overall carbon footprint of the wastewater treatment plant (WWTP).\n- It addresses the need for a simplified, yet accurate, biokinetic model (ASM2d-$N_2O$) to predict $N_2O$ emissions without overparameterization.
GEMINI_How_the_paper_solves_this_problem:
- Developed a biokinetic model (ASM2d-$N_2O$) describing $N_2O$ production and liquid-gas transfer.
- Incorporated reactions mediated by ammonia-oxidizing bacteria (AOB) and denitrifying ordinary heterotrophic organisms (OHOs), while neglecting DPAO contribution to simplify the model.
- Conducted a two-step parameter estimation and sensitivity analysis using laboratory and full-scale data.
- Simulated mitigation strategies by manipulating dissolved oxygen (DO) concentration and mixed liquor recirculation (MLR) ratio.
- Calculated the operational energy demand and carbon footprint to find an optimal balance.
GEMINI_What_experiments_were_done_for_th: - Full-scale measurement campaigns at the Slupsk WWTP (summer 2012 and 2016) to collect routine operational data.\n- Laboratory-scale batch experiments (one-phase anoxic, two-phase anaerobic-anoxic, two-phase anaerobic-aerobic) for model calibration.\n- Microsensor measurements for liquid $N_2O$ concentration and gaseous $N_2O$ emissions.
GEMINI_What_are_the_points_that_can_be_e: - The contribution of denitrifying polyphosphate accumulating organisms (DPAOs) to $N_2O$ production, which was neglected in this study.\n- Long-term dynamic validation of the model under varying seasonal conditions (e.g., winter temperatures).\n- Application and validation of the ASM2d-$N_2O$ model in other full-scale WWTP configurations.
GEMINI_Summarize_the_main_points_of_the_:
- An ASM2d-$N_2O$ model was successfully developed and validated to predict liquid and gaseous $N_2O$ in full-scale bioreactors.
- Heterotrophic denitrification was identified as the predominant $N_2O$ production pathway.
- Adjusting the DO concentration (to 1.3 mg $O_2$/L) and MLR ratio (to 730%) effectively mitigated $N_2O$ production.
- The optimized strategy led to an 11% reduction in $N_2O$ emissions and a potential 10% reduction in the total carbon footprint without compromising effluent standards.

zh_Abstract:
亮点：
- ASM2d-$N_2O$模型预测了全尺寸生物反应器中的液相和气相$N_2O$
- 异养反硝化是主要的$N_2O$产生途径
- 通过调节氧浓度和回流比来减少$N_2O$的产生
- 优化后总碳足迹有望减少10%
GEMINI_zh_What_problem_does_this_paper_a: - 本文旨在模拟和减少全尺寸脱氮除磷活性污泥系统（特别是$A^2O$或改良Bardenpho工艺）中的一氧化二氮（$N_2O$）产生。\n- 旨在降低污水处理厂（WWTP）的整体碳足迹。\n- 解决需要一个简化且准确的生物动力学模型（ASM2d-$N_2O$）来预测$N_2O$排放，同时避免参数过度参数化的问题。
GEMINI_zh_How_the_paper_solves_this_prob:
- 开发并校准了描述$N_2O$产生和液气传质的生物动力学模型（ASM2d-$N_2O$）。
- 模型结合了由氨氧化细菌（AOB）介导的反应和由反硝化普通异养生物（OHOs）介导的连续反应，同时忽略了DPAO的贡献以简化模型。
- 利用实验室规模和全尺寸测量数据进行了两步参数估计和敏感性分析。
- 使用验证后的模型，通过控制溶解氧（DO）浓度和混合液回流（MLR）比来模拟减排策略。
- 计算了运行能源需求和碳足迹，以寻找最佳平衡点。
GEMINI_zh_What_experiments_were_done_for: - 在Slupsk污水处理厂进行了全尺寸测量活动（2012年和2016年夏季），收集了常规运行数据。\n- 进行了实验室规模的批次实验（单相缺氧、两相厌氧-缺氧、两相厌氧-好氧）以校准模型。\n- 使用微传感器测量了液相$N_2O$浓度和气相$N_2O$排放量。
GEMINI_zh_What_are_the_points_that_can_b: - 反硝化聚磷菌（DPAOs）对$N_2O$产生的贡献（在此简化模型中被忽略）。\n- 在不同季节条件（如冬季温度）下对模型进行长期动态验证。\n- 将ASM2d-$N_2O$模型应用于其他全尺寸污水处理厂配置的验证。
GEMINI_zh_Summarize_the_main_points_of_t:
- 成功开发了ASM2d-$N_2O$模型，用于预测全尺寸生物反应器中的液相和气相$N_2O$。
- 确定异养反硝化是主要的$N_2O$产生途径。
- 将DO浓度调节至1.3 mg $O_2$/L，MLR比调节至730%，可有效减少$N_2O$的产生。
- 优化策略在不影响出水水质标准的前提下，使$N_2O$排放量减少了11%，总碳足迹潜在减少了10%。
